competitors.name: Automation Anywhere
competitors.notes: Top RPA competitor with enterprise focus

competitors.name: Blue Prism
competitors.notes: Enterprise RPA pioneer, particularly strong in banking and finance

competitors.name: Microsoft Power Automate
competitors.notes: Microsoft entered RPA market in 2020, acquired Softmotive

competitors.name: Pegasystems
competitors.notes: BPM and low-code platform with RPA capabilities

context: In 2020, UiPath was the RPA market leader, valued at $10.2B after April 2020 funding round. Microsoft's entry into RPA market via Softmotive acquisition and Power Automate created new competitive pressure. The COVID-19 pandemic accelerated RPA adoption as organizations automated processes for remote operations. Blue Prism and Automation Anywhere remained primary competitors. UiPath was preparing for its April 2021 IPO.
